description.ko: 흰색 빛이 수정 프리즘을 통해 찬란한 색의 배열로 변하는 빛의 물리학을 시각화한 매혹적인 장면입니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing visualization of light physics, showcasing the transformation of white light into a brilliant array of colors through a crystal prism.

prompt: A hyper-realistic 3D rendering of a geometric glass prism refracting a beam of white light into a vibrant rainbow spectrum. Soft bokeh background, iridescent reflections, caustic light patterns on a minimalist surface, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting.
